info.title: Deepslate
info.description: OpenAPI specification of the public Deepslate API

tags.name: Assistant Management
tags.description: API endpoints for managing Assistants within an Organization

tags.name: Plan Management
tags.description: API endpoints for managing pricing Plans within a Vendor

tags.name: Organization Management
tags.description: API endpoints for managing Organizations within a Vendor

tags.name: Agent Task Management
tags.description: API endpoints for retrieving Agent Tasks

tags.name: Agent Management
tags.description: API endpoints for managing Agents within an Organization

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific vendor, including its associated organizations.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this vendor

put.description: Updates the details of an existing vendor.

parameters.name: vendorId
parameters.description: ID of the Vendor to update (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this vendor

delete.description: Deletes a specific vendor. This might cascade or be restricted based on associated organizations or other dependencies.

parameters.name: vendorId
parameters.description: ID of the Vendor to delete (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to delete this vendor

409.description: Conflict - Vendor cannot be deleted (e.g., due to existing organizations)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific plan.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this plan

put.description: Updates the details of an existing pricing plan.

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: ID of the Plan to update (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this plan

delete.description: Deletes a specific pricing plan. May be restricted if the plan is currently in use.

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: ID of the Plan to delete (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to delete this plan

409.description: Conflict - Plan cannot be deleted (e.g., currently assigned to organizations)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific organization, including contact info and associated plan.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this organization

put.description: Updates the details of an existing organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: ID of the Organization to update (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this organization

404.description: Organization, Vendor or Plan not found

delete.description: Deletes a specific organization. May be restricted if the organization has active agents, assistants, etc.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: ID of the Organization to delete (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to delete this organization

409.description: Conflict - Organization cannot be deleted (e.g., due to existing agents/assistants)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assistant.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Assistant, Organization or Vendor not found

put.description: Updates an existing assistant's configuration. Allows updating details, extensions, and call event hooks. Extensions and hooks can be modified or added (if ID is provided for update, null/missing for creation within the list).

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: ID of the Assistant to update (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Assistant, Organization or Vendor not found

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: ID of the Assistant to delete (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Assistant, Organization or Vendor not found

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific agent.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Agent, Organization or Vendor not found

put.description: Updates an existing agent's configuration. Allows updating details, extensions, and call event hooks. Extensions and hooks can be modified or added (if ID is provided for update, null/missing for creation within the list).

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: ID of the Agent to update (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Agent, Organization or Vendor not found

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: ID of the Agent to delete (UUID)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

404.description: Agent, Organization or Vendor not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of vendors accessible to the user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc'. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of vendors

403.description: Forbidden
Forbidden - User does not have permission to create vendors

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of plans belonging to a specific vendor.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc'. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of plans

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot access this vendor's plans

post.description: Creates a new pricing plan for the specified vendor.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to create plans for this vendor

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of organizations belonging to a specific vendor.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc'. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of organizations

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot access this vendor's organizations

post.description: Creates a new organization under the specified vendor.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to create organizations for this vendor

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of assistants belonging to a specific organization, filtered by user permissions.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc'. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of assistants

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

post.description: Creates a new assistant within the specified organization with the given configuration, including extensions and call event hooks.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of agents belonging to a specific organization, filtered by user permissions.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc'. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of agents

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

post.description: Creates a new agent within the specified organization with the given configuration, including extensions and call event hooks.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tasks assigned to a specific agent.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page (0-indexed)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort is 'name,asc' (Note: Default field 'name' might not exist on Task, adjust if needed). Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of agent tasks

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot view organization details or agent task descriptions

404.description: Vendor, Organization, or Agent not found

VendorUpdate.description: Data required to update an existing Vendor.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

PlanUpdate.description: Data required to update an existing pricing Plan.

includedInboundSeconds.description: Updated number of inbound minutes included.

includedOutboundSeconds.description: Updated number of outbound minutes included.

inboundSecondsLimit.description: Updated hard limit for inbound minutes.

outboundSecondsLimit.description: Updated hard limit for outbound minutes.

inboundSecondPriceCent.description: Updated price per inbound minute. In Cents.

outboundSecondPriceCent.description: Updated price per outbound minute. In Cents.

inboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Updated price per overuse inbound minute. In Cents.

outboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Updated price per overuse outbound minute. In Cents.

enforceInboundSecondsLimit.description: Updated setting for enforcing inbound limit.

enforceOutboundSecondsLimit.description: Updated setting for enforcing outbound limit.

baseRecurringPriceCent.description: Updated base recurring price. In Cents.

OrganizationUpdate.description: Data required to update an existing Organization.

industry.description: Updated industry the organization operates in.

contact.description: Updated primary contact information for the organization.

planId.description: Updated ID of the Plan assigned to this organization (UUID).

firstName.description: Updated first name of the contact.

lastName.description: Updated last name of the contact.

phoneNumber.description: Updated contact phone number (preferably E.164 format).

country.description: Updated country code of the contact (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

AssistantUpdate.description: Data required to update an existing Assistant.

systemPrompt.description: Updated main system prompt defining the assistant's role and behavior.
systemPrompt.example: You are an expert support assistant for ACME Gadgets Pro series. Prioritize Pro customer issues.

systemPromptGreeting.description: Updated initial greeting message from the assistant.
systemPromptGreeting.example: Welcome back! How can I assist you today?

telephoneNumberId.description: Updated ID of the telephone number assigned to this assistant (UUID).

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: Updated ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the assistant (UUID).

extensions.description: Updated list of LLM extensions for this assistant. Include existing extension IDs (UUID) to update them, omit ID or provide null to create new ones.

callEventHooks.description: Updated list of Call Event Hooks for this assistant. Include existing hook IDs (UUID) to update them, omit ID or provide null to create new ones.

AssistantUpdateCallEventHook.description: Configuration for a Call Event Hook during an update operation. ID (UUID) is optional (null/missing to create, present to update).

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the call event hook instance to update. If null or missing, a new hook is created.

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook. Required for both create and update.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance. Required for both create and update.

AssistantUpdateLlmExtension.description: Configuration for an LLM Extension during an update operation. ID (UUID) is optional (null/missing to create, present to update).

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the LLM extension instance to update. If null or missing, a new extension is created.

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension. Required for both create and update.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance. Required for both create and update.

AgentUpdate.description: Data required to update an existing Agent.

userValueTypes.description: Updated map defining user-specific value types the agent can handle.

systemPromptTemplate.description: Updated template for the system prompt used by the agent's underlying LLM.
systemPromptTemplate.example: You are an expert sales assistant for ACME Corp focusing on upselling existing customers.

telephoneNumberId.description: Updated ID of the telephone number assigned to this agent (UUID).

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: Updated ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the agent (UUID).

extensions.description: Updated list of LLM extensions for this agent. Include existing extension IDs (UUID) to update them, omit ID or provide null to create new ones.

callEventHooks.description: Updated list of Call Event Hooks for this agent. Include existing hook IDs (UUID) to update them, omit ID or provide null to create new ones.

AgentUpdateCallEventHook.description: Configuration for a Call Event Hook during an update operation. ID (UUID) is optional (null/missing to create, present to update).

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the call event hook instance to update. If null or missing, a new hook is created.

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook. Required for both create and update.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance. Required for both create and update.

AgentUpdateLlmExtension.description: Configuration for an LLM Extension during an update operation. ID (UUID) is optional (null/missing to create, present to update).

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the LLM extension instance to update. If null or missing, a new extension is created.

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension. Required for both create and update.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance. Required for both create and update.

VendorCreate.description: Data required to create a new Vendor.

PlanCreate.description: Data required to create a new pricing Plan.

includedInboundSeconds.description: Number of inbound minutes included in the base price.

includedOutboundSeconds.description: Number of outbound minutes included in the base price.

inboundSecondsLimit.description: Hard limit for inbound minutes (usage stops if exceeded and enforce=true).

outboundSecondsLimit.description: Hard limit for outbound minutes (usage stops if exceeded and enforce=true).

inboundSecondPriceCent.description: Price per inbound minute (within included amount, if applicable, otherwise standard rate). In Cents.

outboundSecondPriceCent.description: Price per outbound minute (within included amount, if applicable, otherwise standard rate). In Cents.

inboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Price per inbound minute after included amount is used. In Cents.

outboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Price per outbound minute after included amount is used. In Cents.

enforceInboundSecondsLimit.description: Whether to enforce the hard limit for inbound minutes.

enforceOutboundSecondsLimit.description: Whether to enforce the hard limit for outbound minutes.

baseRecurringPriceCent.description: Base recurring price for the plan (e.g., monthly). In Cents.

OrganizationCreate.description: Data required to create a new Organization.

contact.description: Primary contact information for the organization.

planId.description: ID of the Plan assigned to this organization (UUID).

country.description: Country code of the contact (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

AssistantCreate.description: Data required to create a new Assistant

systemPromptGreeting.description: Initial greeting message from the assistant.
systemPromptGreeting.example: Hello! How can I help you with our products today?

systemPrompt.description: Main system prompt defining the assistant's role and behavior.
systemPrompt.example: You are a customer support assistant for ACME Gadgets. Be polite, helpful, and concise. Escalate complex issues to a human agent if necessary.

telephoneNumberId.description: ID of the telephone number assigned to this assistant (UUID).

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the assistant (UUID).

extensions.description: List of LLM extensions configured for this assistant.

callEventHooks.description: List of Call Event Hooks configured for this assistant.

AssistantCreateCallEventHook.description: Configuration for a Call Event Hook (without ID, as it's being created)

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance (structure depends on the hook type).

AssistantCreateLlmExtension.description: Configuration for an LLM Extension (without ID, as it's being created)

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance (structure depends on the extension type).

AssistantDetails.description: Detailed view of an Assistant's configuration.

systemPrompt.description: Main system prompt defining the assistant's role and behavior.
systemPrompt.example: You are a customer support assistant for ACME Gadgets. Be polite, helpful, and concise. Escalate complex issues to a human agent if necessary.

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the assistant (UUID).

telephoneNumberId.description: ID of the telephone number assigned to this assistant (UUID).

extensions.description: List of LLM extensions configured for this assistant.

callEventHooks.description: List of Call Event Hooks configured for this assistant.

systemPromptGreeting.description: Initial greeting message from the assistant.
systemPromptGreeting.example: Hello! How can I help you with our products today?

AssistantDetailsCallEventHook.description: Configuration details for an existing Call Event Hook.

id.description: Unique identifier of the call event hook instance (UUID).

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance (structure depends on the hook type).

AssistantDetailsLlmExtension.description: Configuration details for an existing LLM Extension.

id.description: Unique identifier of the LLM extension instance (UUID).

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance (structure depends on the extension type). Null values may be present.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

AgentCreate.description: Data required to create a new Agent

userValueTypes.description: Map defining user-specific value types the agent can handle.

systemPromptTemplate.description: Template for the system prompt used by the agent's underlying LLM.
systemPromptTemplate.example: You are a helpful sales assistant for ACME Corp. Your goal is to qualify leads.

telephoneNumberId.description: ID of the telephone number assigned to this agent (UUID).

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the agent (UUID).

extensions.description: List of LLM extensions configured for this agent.

callEventHooks.description: List of Call Event Hooks configured for this agent.

AgentCreateCallEventHook.description: Configuration for a Call Event Hook (without ID, as it's being created)

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance (structure depends on the hook type).

AgentCreateLlmExtension.description: Configuration for an LLM Extension (without ID, as it's being created)

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance (structure depends on the extension type).

AgentDetails.description: Detailed view of an Agent's configuration.

systemPromptTemplate.description: Template for the system prompt used by the agent's underlying LLM.
systemPromptTemplate.example: You are a helpful sales assistant for ACME Corp. Your goal is to qualify leads.

userValueTypes.description: Map defining user-specific value types the agent can handle.

llmAudioContentGenerationStrategyId.description: ID of the LLM Audio Content Generation Strategy used by the agent (UUID).

telephoneNumberId.description: ID of the telephone number assigned to this agent (UUID).

extensions.description: List of LLM extensions configured for this agent.

callEventHooks.description: List of Call Event Hooks configured for this agent.

AgentDetailsCallEventHook.description: Configuration details for an existing Call Event Hook.

id.description: Unique identifier of the call event hook instance (UUID).

type.description: Type identifier for the call event hook.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this hook instance (structure depends on the hook type).

AgentDetailsLlmExtension.description: Configuration details for an existing LLM Extension.

id.description: Unique identifier of the LLM extension instance (UUID).

type.description: Type identifier for the LLM extension.

parameters.description: Specific parameters for this extension instance (structure depends on the extension type).

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

VendorDescription.description: Basic identifying information for a Vendor, typically used in lists.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

OrganizationDescription.description: Basic identifying information for an Organization, typically used in lists.

VendorDetails.description: Detailed view of a Vendor's configuration, including associated organizations.

organizations.description: List of organizations associated with this vendor (basic description).

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

PlanDescription.description: Basic identifying information for a Plan, typically used in lists.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

PlanDetails.description: Detailed view of a pricing Plan's configuration.

includedInboundSeconds.description: Number of inbound minutes included in the base price.

includedOutboundSeconds.description: Number of outbound minutes included in the base price.

inboundSecondsLimit.description: Hard limit for inbound minutes (usage stops if exceeded and enforce=true).

outboundSecondsLimit.description: Hard limit for outbound minutes (usage stops if exceeded and enforce=true).

inboundSecondPriceCent.description: Price per inbound minute (within included amount, if applicable, otherwise standard rate). In Cents.

outboundSecondPriceCent.description: Price per outbound minute (within included amount, if applicable, otherwise standard rate). In Cents.

inboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Price per inbound minute after included amount is used. In Cents.

outboundSecondOverusePriceCent.description: Price per outbound minute after included amount is used. In Cents.

enforceInboundSecondsLimit.description: Whether to enforce the hard limit for inbound minutes.

enforceOutboundSecondsLimit.description: Whether to enforce the hard limit for outbound minutes.

baseRecurringPriceCent.description: Base recurring price for the plan (e.g., monthly). In Cents.

OrganizationDetails.description: Detailed view of an Organization's configuration.

contact.description: Primary contact information for the organization.

plan.description: Plan assigned to this organization (basic description).

country.description: Country code of the contact (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

AssistantDescription.description: Basic identifying information for an Assistant, typically used in lists.

AgentDescription.description: Basic identifying information for an Agent, typically used in lists.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

AgentTaskDescription.description: Basic description of an Agent Task, typically used in lists.

id.description: Unique identifier of the agent task (UUID).

userValues.description: Key-value pairs representing user-specific data relevant to the task.

targetNumber.description: Target phone number for the task (e.g., customer callback number, preferably E.164 format).

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful
